command.source: SELECT CAST(clnt.client_nbr AS INTEGER) AS cn, clnt.client_name FROM rbate_reg.client clnt, rbate_reg.rebate_invoice reb_inv WHERE clnt.pcs_system_id = reb_inv.pcs_system_id AND NVL(reb_inv.rebate_inv_term_dt, TO_DATE('12319999','MMDDYYYY')) >= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)),-9) AND UPPER(clnt.client_nbr) = LOWER(clnt.client_nbr) ORDER BY cn
command.target: INSERT INTO VRAP.tclt_consolidated VALUES ( ?, ?, NULL, 'JAVAORA1', CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME, 'JAVAORA1', CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME )

try.command: INSERT INTO VRAP.tclt_consolidated SELECT tc.clt_id, tc.clt_nm, tc.client_cd, 'JAVAUDB1', CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME, 'JAVAUDB1', CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME FROM VRAP.tclt tc WHERE tc.clt_id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT t.clt_id FROM VRAP.tclt_consolidated t ) ORDER BY tc.clt_id

INSERT INTO VRAP.tclt_model SELECT tcc.clt_id, '1900-01-01', '12-31-9999', CASE WHEN CREATE_USER_ID = 'JAVAORA1' THEN 'G' ELSE 'D' END AS model_typ_cd, CREATE_USER_ID, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME, UPDT_USER_ID, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME FROM VRAP.tclt_consolidated tcc WHERE tcc.clt_id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT tm.clt_id FROM VRAP.tclt_model tm ) ORDER BY model_typ_cd desc, tcc.clt_id

command.source: SELECT m.CLT_ID, m.EFFECTIVE_DT, m.EXPIRATION_DT, m.MODEL_TYP_CD, m.CREATE_USER_ID, TIMESTAMP(m.CREATE_DT, m.CREATE_TIME), m.UPDT_USER_ID, TIMESTAMP(m.UPDT_DT, m.UPDT_TIME) FROM VRAP.TCLT_MODEL AS m WHERE m.CREATE_DT >= CURRENT_DATE - 4 DAYS

catch.command:
[ERROR] REFESH CLIENT MODEL ASSOCIATION

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}
